name: nativescript-numeric-keyboard
description: Handy and elegant numeric keyboard for iOS NativeScript apps. On Android we fall back to the regular numeric keyboard for now.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-numeric-keyboard && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo
